TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MonthChangedEventArgs extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户单击时引发事件导航控件以显示下一步或上一个月。The event is raised when the user clicks the navigation controls to display the next or previous month. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序中显示的事件控件是否控件已移动向前或向后一个月。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event that displays in a control whether the control has moved forward or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |`NewDate`|`newDate`| |`PreviousDate`|`previousDate`|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime NewDate { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个日期，该日期确定 控件中当前显示的月份。

span.span: Gets the date that determines the currently displayed month in the control.

value.span: 一个日期，该日期确定 当前显示的月份。

span.span: The date that determines the month currently displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来获取当前显示的月份控件和要比较当前显示的月份与另一个月。Use this property to get the month currently displayed by the control and to compare the currently displayed month with another month. 例如，此属性可用于计算日期之前或从特定日期的月份数。For example, you can use this property to calculate the number of months until or since a certain date. 此日期通常是当前显示的第一个日期月;但是，它可以以编程方式更改为一个月内的任何日期。This date is normally the first date of the currently displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month. 属性可分配给此属性以编程方式重写月更改，当用户单击的导航控件控件。The property can be assigned to this property programmatically to override the month change when the user clicks the navigation controls for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何比较个月的属性和属性来确定是否控件前移一个月或向后一个月。The following code example demonstrates how to compare the months of the property and the property to determine whether the control moved forward one month or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PreviousDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime PreviousDate { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个日期，该日期确定 控件中以前显示的月份。

span.span: Gets the date that determines the previously displayed month in the control.

value.span: 一个日期，该日期确定 以前显示的月份。

span.span: The date that determines the month previously displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定以前显示的月份上控件。Use this property to determine the previously displayed month on the control. 你可以还原控件添加到通过设置以前显示的月份属性。You can restore the control to the previously displayed month by setting the property to . 此日期通常是以前显示的第一个日期月;但是，它可以以编程方式更改为一个月内的任何日期。This date is normally the first date of the previously displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month. 属性更新为之前的此属性中的日期引发事件。The property is updated to the date in this property before the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何比较个月的属性和属性来确定是否控件前移一个月或向后一个月。The following code example demonstrates how to compare the months of the property and the property to determine whether the control moved forward one month or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)]
